Package org.dataconservancy.dcs.ingest.services

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BasicFeatureExtraction.OutcomeListener
    Allows user-defined behaviour upon success or failure of a transform job.
    IngestService  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Archiver
    Sends a SIP to the archive service.
    BasicFeatureExtraction
    Executes a series of feature extraction jobs on ingested SIPs.
    BasicFeatureExtraction.Job<Ko,Vo>
    Transform/extraction job to be run by BasicFeatureExtraction.
    BranchChecker  
    Cleanup  
    ExternalContentStager
    Retrieves and stages extant content included by reference.
    Finisher
    Verifies SIP in archive and index, issues an ingest success event.
    IngestServiceBase
    Base configuration for all ingest services.
    Labeller
    Assigns a DCS identity to each component in a SIP.
    LineageLabeller
    Assign lineage identifiers to Deliverable Units.
    SimpleLinkValidator
    Assures that all identifiers and links contain valid dcs ids, and no two entities in the sip have the same id.
    SimpleMimeCharacterizer
    Detects and adds mime characterization to files.
    StagedContentResolver
    Changes file src links for uploaded files from opaque IDs to internal resolvable URIs, and copies relevant info from uploaded file.
    TimedServiceWrapper
    Wraps a delegate IngestService, and stores the time the service started, and when the service completed.
    VirusChecker
    Does a virus scan on a files in a sip
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IngestServiceException
    Represents a "logical" failure of an ingest service.
